description: Display AdCP product inventory from get_products MCP tool calls. Use this visualization IMMEDIATELY when you receive products from the AdCP get_products tool.
usage: Wrap the get_products response in <visualization-data type="adcp_get_products-visualization"> tags as soon as you have the products array. Do NOT wait until the end of your response.
outputTrigger: As soon as you receive a products array from get_products, output the visualization immediately before continuing your analysis.

dataMapping.visualizationType: adcp_get_products-visualization (REQUIRED - must be exactly this string)
dataMapping.title: Title for the inventory display (e.g., 'Available Advertising Inventory')
dataMapping.subtitle: Subtitle describing the context (e.g., 'Products matching campaign criteria')
dataMapping.brief_received: The natural language brief that was sent to get_products

exampleOutput.title: Available Advertising Inventory
exampleOutput.subtitle: Premium CTV inventory for sports campaign
exampleOutput.brief_received: Premium CTV inventory for sports campaign targeting male 25-54
exampleOutput.message: Found 2 premium CTV products matching your sports campaign criteria

uiRendering.description: The UI renders an interactive product grid showing:
features: Product cards with channel badges (CTV, OLV, Audio, etc.)
Brand safety tier indicators with color coding
CPM pricing and minimum spend requirements
Daily impressions and reach estimates with formatting
Audience composition breakdown with progress bars
